content_html: Kathmandu, Sept 19: CPN (UML) Chair and erstwhile Prime Minister KP Sharma Oli has appealed to all to get united for the protection of the Constitution and national sovereignty. Issuing a press statement today on the occasion of the Constitution Day, he described the Constitution as a road map to the future, crafted

title: Former PM Oli appeals for collective efforts for Constitution protection
